definitions.definition: person in or position of authority

confusables: chair , chairman, chairperson, chairwoman

source.author: PopSci Commerce Team
source.title: Best desk chair for any home office

exampleSentences.sentence: The best desk chair has to look and feel good so your office is a tranquil, productive space.

source.author: Rob Verger
source.title: This surprisingly common flight issue contributed to Kobe Bryant’s helicopter crash

exampleSentences.sentence: For example, Stepanek says that if you were to sit in an office chair with your eyes closed, and someone were to rotate it very smoothly at a constant rate, eventually your vestibular system would be thrown off.

source.author: PopSci Commerce Team
source.title: Best heated throw blanket: Bundle up with these electric blankets

exampleSentences.sentence: However, a throw-size blanket for use on a chair or couch is not designed to be that large anyway, so it’s easier to find budget blankets in that size range.

source.author: Seung Min Kim, Karoun Demirjian
source.title: Republican senators show emotion, but little evidence of changed minds

exampleSentences.sentence: Hawley’s feet were up on a chair as he studiously scanned through stacks of papers, which he later said were trial briefs from both legal teams.

source.author: Annalee Newitz
source.title: What archaeologists got wrong about female statues, goddesses, and fertility

exampleSentences.sentence: He was especially impressed by one of them, who was seated in a chair with her hands on the heads of two leopards.

source.author: Lila MacLellan
source.title: ‘Nano transitions’ are the secret to staying productive and avoiding burnout

exampleSentences.sentence: Finally, I settled in again, but my dog pranced over to my chair and pawed at my knee—she needed to go out.

source.author: Neel Patel
source.title: The UAE’s Hope probe is about to arrive at Mars in a historic first

exampleSentences.sentence: “The team has prepared as well as they could possibly prepare to reach orbit around Mars,” says Sarah Al Amiri, chair of the UAE Space Agency.

source.author: Jeanne Huber
source.title: Yes, you can repaint plastic outdoor chairs

exampleSentences.sentence: Whether you paint your chairs yourself or turn the job over to the pros, think about the color.

source.author: Rick Maese
source.title: Democrats introduce most progressive plan yet to help college athletes earn money

exampleSentences.sentence: Wicker was then chair of the Senate’s Commerce Committee, which gave the proposal plenty of weight.

source.author: Lisa Halverstadt
source.title: Gloria Eagerly Flagged Budget Issues But Is Less Eager to ID Solutions

exampleSentences.sentence: Chris Cate, the City Council’s sole Republican and chair of its budget committee, said he expects tough conversations ahead – and like Gloria, hopes they might inspire reflection on longstanding issues.
